name: discover cultural artifacts
notification: We have discovered cultural artifacts! (+20 culture)

name: squatters willing to work for you
squatters wishing to settle under your rule
your exploring unit receives training
notification: An ancient tribe trained us in their ways of combat!

name: survivors (adds population to a city)
notification: We have found survivors! Population added to [cityName].

name: discover a lost technology
notification: We have discovered the lost technology of [techName]!
uniques: [1] free random researchable Tech(s) from the [Ancient era] <before the [Industrial era]>
[1] free random researchable Tech(s) from the [Medieval era] <starting from the [Industrial era]> <before the [Atomic era]>
[1] free random researchable Tech(s) from the [Modern era] <starting from the [Atomic era]>

name: advanced weaponry for your explorer
notification: Our unit finds advanced weaponry hidden!
uniques: [This Unit] upgrades for free including special upgrades

name: reveal nearby Barbarian camps
notification: You find evidence of Barbarian activity. Nearby Barbarian camps are revealed!
uniques: Reveal up to [All] [Barbarian encampment] within a [12] tile radius

name: find a crudely-drawn map
notification: We have found a crudely-drawn map in the ruins!
uniques: From a randomly chosen tile [4] tiles away from the ruins, reveal tiles up to [4] tiles away with [80]% chance

name: discover holy symbols
notification: We have found holy symbols that inspire our people, allowing us to understand the world through religion! (+[faithAmount] Faith)
uniques: Gain enough Faith for a Pantheon

name: an ancient prophecy
notification: We have found scrolls detailing an ancient prophecy, greatly increasing our spiritual connection! (+[faithAmount] Faith)
uniques: Gain enough Faith for [33]% of a Great Prophet
